metadata.title: CVE-2023-2798 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Those using HtmlUnit to browse untrusted webpages may be vulnerable toDenial of service attacks (DoS). If HtmlUnit is running on user suppliedweb pages, an attacker may supply content that causes HtmlUnit to crash bya stack overflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.Thisissue affects htmlunit before 2.70.0.

criterions.comment: htmlunit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
jenkins-htmlunit-core-js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
